title: AG40024: Environmental Biotechnology - Quick Facts
text:
AG40024
Course name | Environmental Biotechnology
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Cleaner bioprocesses and sustainable development; classification and characterization of wastes, analytical techniques in environment monitoring; wastewater biotreatment: characteristics of wastewater, aerobic and anaerobic wastewater treatment processes; activated sludge process, trickling filter, lagooning process, rotary disc biological contractor, photosynthetic wastewater treatment, biomethanation process, biological treatment of solid wastes: downstream processing of biological waste treatment processes, landfill technologies, bioinsecticide, biofertilizer, biological fuel generation (biodiesel, bioethanol, biohydrogen), bioremediation of hazardous wastes, biomarker, biosensor.
